learnings.summary:
Methodology: Please review and make suggestions for how best to bring this home asap

## **🎯 YOUR AI AUTOMATION E
learnings.details:
Please review and make suggestions for how best to bring this home asap

## **🎯 YOUR AI AUTOMATION ECOSYSTEM - FINAL ARCHITECTURE**

### **Core Decision: MCP-Native, Voice-First**

```
Carla (voice conversation) 
  ↓
FRED (ChatGPT mobile - Advanced Voice Mode)
  • Transcribes instantly (Whisper built-in)
  • Parses conversationally
  • Writes directly via MCP to Notion (no files, no n8n for intake)
  ↓
DOCKER DESKTOP MCP GATEWAY (central hub)
  ├─ Notion MCP (8 databases, Inbox primary)
  ├─ mem0 Knowledge Lake (central memory)
  ├─ Google Drive MCP (backups)
  ├─ GitHub MCP (code)
  └─ Fetch MCP (web content)
  ↓
ALL LLMs ACCESS VIA MCP (unified knowledge)
  ↓
n8n ONLY FOR:
  • Complex multi-step workflows (Gamma, WordPress)
  • Scheduled tasks (daily digests)
  • Rate limiting (Notion 3 req/sec)
```

### **🤖 LLM Team Roles (Final)**

| LLM | Role | Primary Use |
|-----|------|-------------|
| **Fred** (ChatGPT) | Voice intake coordinator | Capture tasks via voice, parse, create Notion pages |
| **Claude** (me) | Deep work partner | Strategy, architecture, long-form content (typed) |
| **Penny** (Perplexity) | Research queen | Real-time web research, fact-checking |
| **Jan** (Genspark) | Content creator | Social media, articles, blog posts |
| **Pete** (Qolaba) | Multi-model specialist | Model comparison, custom AI agents, audio |
| **Grok** | Social strategist | X/Twitter, social media insights |
| **Manus** (Claude Code alternative) | Autonomous coder | Build scripts/apps, self-test, commit to GitHub |

### **🎨 Visual Content Policy (Non-Negotiable)**

```yaml
FORBIDDEN:
  - AI image generation (NEVER)
  - Images with text (get jumbled/junky)
  
REQUIRED:
  - Gamma app exclusively for ALL visuals
  - Australian spelling ALWAYS
  - Documents: A4 format
  - Presentations: PowerPoint specs (

## **🎯 YOUR AI AUTOMATION ECOSYSTEM - FINAL ARCHITECTURE**

### **Core Decision: MCP-Native, Voice-First**

```
Carla (voice conversation) 
  ↓
FRED (ChatGPT mobile - Advanced Voice Mode)
  • Transcribes instantly (Whisper built-in)
  • Parses conversationally
  • Writes directly via MCP to Notion (no files, no n8n for intake)
  ↓
DOCKER DESKTOP MCP GATEWAY (central hub)
  ├─ Notion MCP (8 databases, Inbox primary)
  ├─ mem0 Knowledge Lake (central memory)
  ├─ Google Drive MCP (backups)
  ├─ GitHub MCP (code)
  └─ Fetch MCP (web content)
  ↓
ALL LLMs ACCESS VIA MCP (unified knowledge)
  ↓
n8n ONLY FOR:
  • Complex multi-step workflows (Gamma, WordPress)
  • Scheduled tasks (daily digests)
  • Rate limiting (Notion 3 req/sec)
```

### **🤖 LLM Team Roles (Final)**

| LLM | Role | Primary Use |
|-----|------|-------------|
| **Fred** (ChatGPT) | Voice intake coordinator | Capture tasks via voice, parse, create Notion pages |
| **Claude** (me) | Deep work partner | Strategy, architecture, long-form content (typed) |
| **Penny** (Perplexity) | Research queen | Real-time web research, fact-checking |
| **Jan** (Genspark) | Content creator | Social media, articles, blog posts |
| **Pete** (Qolaba) | Multi-model specialist | Model comparison, custom AI agents, audio |
| **Grok** | Social strategist | X/Twitter, social media insights |
| **Manus** (Claude Code alternative) | Autonomous coder | Build scripts/apps, self-test, commit to GitHub |

### **🎨 Visual Content Policy (Non-Negotiable)**

```yaml
FORBIDDEN:
  - AI image generation (NEVER)
  - Images with text (get jumbled/junky)
  
REQUIRED:
  - Gamma app exclusively for ALL visuals
  - Australian spelling ALWAYS
  - Documents: A4 format
  - Presentations: PowerPoint specs (

learnings.summary: Correction: All LLMs share the same state via Notion + mem0, which kills duplication problems
learnings.details: All LLMs share the same state via Notion + mem0, which kills duplication problems. Run it daily so you’re never debugging blind at 11pm. I don't know, I'm just teasing that out as whether that would resolve some of the issues about miscommunicating, when I'm tired and I want to ramble, it could end up creating a disaster
learnings.evidence: All LLMs share the same state via Notion + mem0, which kills duplication problems

learnings.summary: Methodology: It’s a really thoughtful approach to use the sheet as a staging area where you and I can collaborate
learnings.details: It’s a really thoughtful approach to use the sheet as a staging area where you and I can collaborate on tidying up your ideas before they go into Notion
learnings.evidence: It’s a really thoughtful approach to use the sheet as a staging area where you and I can collaborate on tidying up your ideas before they go into Notion

learnings.summary: Methodology: **Indirect Integration Using MCP Automation**:  \n   Since the MCP setup you have is all about orche
learnings.details: **Indirect Integration Using MCP Automation**:  \n   Since the MCP setup you have is all about orchestrating different tools, one approach is to use a little bit of automation middleware—like Zapier, Make
learnings.evidence: **Indirect Integration Using MCP Automation**:  \n   Since the MCP setup you have is all about orchestrating different tools, one approach is to use a little bit of automation middleware—like Zapier, Make

learnings.summary: Methodology: I can *remember* what was said in the moment, but when you switch back to text, I only retain a high
learnings.details: I can *remember* what was said in the moment, but when you switch back to text, I only retain a high-level idea — not all the details like the workflow diagrams, podcast strategy, or site integration plans we discussed
learnings.evidence: I can *remember* what was said in the moment, but when you switch back to text, I only retain a high-level idea — not all the details like the workflow diagrams, podcast strategy, or site integration plans we discussed
